meanings.definition: A genus of parasitic protozoa that cause leishmaniasis in humans and animals.
meanings.sent1: Leishmanias can be harmful to both people and animals.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying different types of leishmanias to find a cure.
meanings.sent3: The leishmanias at the party were not very good at dancing.
meanings.sent4: The spread of leishmanias in the community was like a wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The microscope revealed the intricate details of the leishmanias.

meanings.definition: The plural form of leishmania, referring to multiple species of the protozoa.
meanings.sent1: There are many different leishmanias found in various regions.
meanings.sent2: The leishmanias in the lab were carefully analyzed by the researchers.
meanings.sent3: The leishmanias in the petri dish seemed to be having a party.
meanings.sent4: The diversity of leishmanias in nature is truly fascinating.
meanings.sent5: The field guide helped identify the different types of leishmanias.
